content: https://doc.rust-lang.org/nightly/std/simd/struct.Simd.html doesn't list a trunc method when I try to look with Ctrl+F, but https://doc.rust-lang.org/nightly/src/core/up/up/portable-simd/crates/core_simd/src/round.rs.html#37 lists it as existing.
I think all of the rounding functions require libm, which we haven't enabled
Caleb is correct, I started experimenting with two different ways to ship those functions.
